attributes.action: Make llanelli 's empty buildings into homes for homeless veterans
attributes.background: There are so many veterans sleeping rough on the streets. They took there time to fight wars to keep us safe now let's give something back to them

rejection.details:
It's not clear from your petition who owns the empty buildings which you would like to be used. Unless they are owned by the UK Government, this isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could do.

This might be something that you could raise with your local council, who are responsible for housing in your area.
